time in the Sierra Nevada mountains as a child.
Tia

messages.messageBody:
starsuncloud@... wrote:

>

We just finished reading this in our house. It's about a homeschooled
(presumably unschooled) girl who spends some time in high school. It's
a chapter book.

Debra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 1294
messages.msgSnippet: I m thinking that Stargirl by Spinelli is also about a homeschooler. It s been ages since I read it though. I m glad you mentioned this one Tia. We ve been
messages.messageBody:
"I'm thinking that Stargirl by Spinelli is also about a homeschooler. It's
been ages since I read it though."

I'm glad you mentioned this one Tia. We've been meaning to buy it, having heard it recommended by other unschoolers.
Sierra's middle name is Star, and we've been calling her "stargirl" from the time she was born, before we'd ever heard of the book.:)

Ren


Learn about unschooling at:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/
